refnamediv.refpurpose: generates the IUPAC name for the given molecule

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cdk-iupacname reads an input file and tries to generate a IUPAC name for this structure. Currently only a few IUPAC rules are implemented, but simple alkane structures can be named.
The output language can be set using --dutch or --german.
